text: Boniface Sunday Emerengwa (born 19?? in Rivers State) is a Nigerian lawyer and People's Democratic Party politician. He represents Ikwerre-Emohua constituency in the House of Representatives of Nigeria, a post he was elected to in March 2015. Emerengwa has served as Rivers State Budget and Economic Planning Commissioner. He is also a former Chairman of Ikwerre local government area in the state. ==See also== *List of people from Rivers State ==References== Category:Living people Category:Commissioners of ministries of Rivers State Category:Rivers State People's Democratic Party politicians Category:Mayors of places in Rivers State Category:People from Ikwerre (local government area) Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Nigeria) from Rivers State Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Rivers State lawyers Category:People's Democratic Party members of the House of Representatives (Nigeria) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Boniface S. Emerengwa
